title: Internal compiler error when compiling an example from "windows" crate

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code When building any of the examples from https://github.com/microsoft/windows-rs/tree/master/examples using cross compilation (from Linux to Windows x86_64-pc-windows-gnu target) the compiler panics. ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.50.0 (cb75ad5db 2021-02-10) binary: rustc commit-hash: cb75ad5db02783e8b0222fee363c5f63f7e2cf5b commit-date: 2021-02-10 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.50.0 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'compiler/rustc_resolve/src/imports.rs:904:25: inconsistent resolution for an import', /rustc/cb75ad5db02783e8b0222fee363c5f63f7e2cf5b/compiler/rustc_middle/src/util/bug.rs:34:26 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.50.0 (cb75ad5db 2021-02-10) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C linker=x86_64-w64-mingw32-gcc -C incremental -C link-args=-lstdc++ --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `windows_gen` ```
Backtrace

``` stack backtrace: 0: std::panicking::begin_panic 1: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_opt 2: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt 3: rustc_middle::util::bug::span_bug_fmt 4: rustc_resolve::imports::ImportResolver::finalize_import 5: rustc_resolve::imports::ImportResolver::finalize_imports 6: rustc_resolve::Resolver::resolve_crate 7: rustc_interface::passes::configure_and_expand_inner 8: rustc_interface::passes::configure_and_expand::{{closure}} 9: rustc_data_structures::box_region::PinnedGenerator::new 10: rustc_interface::passes::configure_and_expand 11: rustc_interface::queries::Queries::expansion 12: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 13: rustc_span::with_source_map 14: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run ```
